snippet: Consumers appear to be holding on to savings from a windfall from lower gasoline prices.
abstract: Commerce Dept reports retail sales in April were flat, following revised 1.1 percent rise in March.
lead_paragraph: Consumers appear to be holding on to savings from a windfall from lower gasoline prices.

headline.main: U.S. Retail Sales Remained Weak in April
headline.print_headline: Weak Reports in Retailing and Imports Deflate Optimism for Recovery
